name: Base of War
description:
After the Nuclear apocalypse in 2025 the World flooded and separated into smaller continents. Only the fortunate survived. After 80 years in shelters, the human race started building a new world.

Real-Time Wars
Battles take place on the game world map. All players can watch and participate in battles in real time.

Industry
Craft and trade dozens of items by building Farms, Mines and Factories.

Commanders
Unlock and collect new, powerful Commanders

Alliance System
Alliance members can help each other. Players can participate in Rallies and conquer opponent bases.
